FROM t_pending tp INNER JOIN t_pending_adjust tpa ON tp.pdId = tpa.pdId INNER JOIN t_pending_rework tpr ON tpa.pdAdjustId = tpr.pdAdjustId INNER JOIN m_part p ON tp.partid = p.partid INNER JOIN m_wip wip ON tp.wip = wip.wip INNER JOIN m_wip wiprw ON tpr.wip = wiprw.wip INNER JOIN m_customer mc ON tp.customerid = mc.customerid
tp.wip = #wipFr# tpr.wip = #wipTo# tpa.reportDate >= #reportDateFr# tpa.reportDate <= #reportDateTo# p.partNo like #partNo# + '%' p.partName like #partName# + '%' mc.customerid = #customerId# (tpr.reworkQty > ISNULL(tpr.reworkAdjustQty,0)) (tpr.reworkQty <= ISNULL(tpr.reworkAdjustQty,0))
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT tpr.pdReworkId ,wip.wipName as wipFr ,wiprw.wipName as wipTo ,tpa.reportDate ,mc.customerCode ,p.partNo ,p.partName ,tpr.reworkQty - ISNULL(tpr.reworkAdjustQty,0) as reworkQty
) tbl WHERE tbl.reworkQty > 0 ORDER BY wipFr ,wipTo ,reportDate DESC ,partNo

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT tpr.pdReworkId ,wip.wipName as wipFr ,wiprw.wipName as wipTo ,tpa.reportDate ,mc.customerCode ,p.partNo ,p.partName ,tpr.reworkQty - ISNULL(tpr.reworkAdjustQty,0) as reworkQty
) tbl WHERE tbl.reworkQty > 0
